segments.text: My mom and dad insist that I be home before ten . Do you have a curfew ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I've had one for as long as I can remember .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish my parents were a little more lenient .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I actually like having a curfew . I have an excuse to get to bed on time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You like going to bed early ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like being too tired the next day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I still hate having a curfew .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you stayed up much later , you would see that just about every-thing closes around ten anyway .
segments.speaker: S2
